business_audit.description: Comprehensive audit services for enterprise clients seeking deep insights into operations, compliance, and market positioning

market_entry_audit.name: Market Entry Audit
market_entry_audit.tagline: De-risk your market expansion with AI-powered analysis
market_entry_audit.description: Comprehensive assessment of market entry opportunities for new countries and regions, combining AI-driven data analysis with human strategic oversight

phase_2_analysis: Market size and growth potential quantification

factors_affecting_price: Number of target markets (each additional market +$8,000)

accuracy.target: Market projections within 15% of actual performance

roi_for_client.measurement: Revenue generated from market entry vs. audit cost

financial_audit.name: Financial Audit & Analysis
financial_audit.tagline: AI-enhanced financial intelligence for smarter decisions
financial_audit.description: Deep financial analysis combining automated data processing with expert human interpretation to uncover optimization opportunities and risks

operational_financial_analysis: Burn rate and runway calculation (for growth companies)

factors_affecting_price: Historical period analyzed (+$3,000 per additional year)

operational_efficiency_audit.name: Operational Efficiency Audit
operational_efficiency_audit.description: Comprehensive operational analysis identifying bottlenecks, inefficiencies, and automation opportunities across business processes

factors_affecting_price: Number of processes analyzed (+$4,000 per major process)

automation_potential.target: 30% of manual tasks identified for automation

digital_transformation_audit.name: Digital Transformation Audit
digital_transformation_audit.tagline: AI-powered assessment of your digital future
digital_transformation_audit.description: Comprehensive evaluation of digital maturity, technology stack, and transformation readiness with actionable roadmap for digital excellence

factors_affecting_price: Number of business units (+$8,000 per unit)

maturity_improvement.target: 2 levels on maturity scale within 18 months

roi.measurement: Cost savings + revenue growth vs. investment

implementation_success.target: 75% of roadmap initiatives launched within 24 months

risk_assessment.name: Enterprise Risk Assessment
risk_assessment.tagline: AI-enhanced risk intelligence for resilient business
risk_assessment.description: Comprehensive risk identification, quantification, and mitigation planning across operational, financial, strategic, and compliance domains

risk_quantification: Monte Carlo simulations for critical risks

factors_affecting_price: Company size and complexity (+$15,000 for large enterprises)
Industry risk profile (+$10,000 for high-risk industries)
Number of risk domains (+$5,000 per additional domain)

risk_reduction.target: 30% reduction in high-risk items within 12 months

compliance_audit.name: Compliance & Regulatory Audit
compliance_audit.description: Comprehensive compliance assessment across regulatory frameworks with gap analysis and remediation roadmap

audit_readiness.target: Pass external audit with minor findings only

market_research.description: Data-driven market insights combining AI-powered analysis with human strategic interpretation

international_market_research.name: International Market Research
international_market_research.tagline: Navigate global markets with AI-powered intelligence
international_market_research.description: Comprehensive market research for international expansion covering EU, Nordic countries, CIS, and other regions with deep cultural and economic insights

actionability.target: Client proceeds with market entry in 80% of cases

roi.target: Client achieves 5x return on research investment
roi.measurement: Market entry performance vs. research cost

competitive_intelligence.name: Competitive Intelligence
competitive_intelligence.tagline: Stay ahead with AI-powered competitive insights
competitive_intelligence.description: Ongoing competitive monitoring and deep-dive competitor analysis providing strategic intelligence for decision-making

early_warning.target: Identify competitive threats 3-6 months before market impact
early_warning.measurement: Tracking of predicted vs. actual competitive moves

decision_impact.target: Intelligence directly influences 60% of strategic decisions

roi.target: Prevent competitive losses worth 10x+ research investment

industry_trend_analysis.name: Industry Trend Analysis
industry_trend_analysis.tagline: Future-proof your strategy with AI trend intelligence
industry_trend_analysis.description: Forward-looking industry analysis identifying emerging trends, disruptive forces, and strategic opportunities

factors_affecting_price: Number of trend domains (+$5,000 per domain)

predictive_accuracy.target: 70% of identified trends materialize within forecast timeframe

strategic_value.target: Client captures 2+ new opportunities from insights

competitive_advantage.measurement: Client market moves vs. competitor moves

customer_segmentation_analysis.name: Customer Segmentation & Analysis
customer_segmentation_analysis.tagline: AI-powered customer intelligence for targeted growth
customer_segmentation_analysis.description: Advanced customer segmentation using AI and data analytics to identify high-value segments and optimize targeting strategies

factors_affecting_price: Number of markets (+$6,000 per additional market)

targeting_improvement.measurement: A/B testing of segment-based vs. traditional campaigns

customer_value.target: 25% increase in customer lifetime value for targeted segments
